description: Create the ultimate chocolate hazelnut truffles with crushed Oreo cookies, Philadelphia cream cheese and Cadbury milk chocolate.
name: Oreo Chocolate Hazelnut Truffles Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 270g Oreo Double Stuff Choc Hazelnut Cookies
250g Philadelphia Cream Cheese Original Block, softened slightly
180g Cadbury Baking Milk Chocolate, broken into pieces

recipeInstructions.text: Line a baking tray with baking paper. Process cookies in a food processor until finely crushed. Reserve 2 tbs.
Combine cream cheese and crushed cookies in a bowl. Roll 1 tbs of mixture into a ball, then place on prepared tray. Repeat for remaining mixture. Chill balls for 1 hour or until firm.

Place chocolate in a microwave-safe bowl and microwave on high for 1 minute, stirring occasionally, or until melted and smooth. Using 2 fork to hold the balls, dip balls in melted chocolate to coat. Allow any excess to drain off. Place on the lined tray.
Sprinkle truffles with reserved crushed cookies. Chill for 30 minutes or until set.
